description: Ticker short name - can be use to group 2 different tickers together e.g. es3.si and g3b.si
e.g. singapore | united states | hong kong
Exchange traded currency e.g. sgd | usd
Applicable only for crypto / fx currency [base currency]
Applicable only for crypto / fx currency [foreign currency]
Instrument is still listed or not
Some instruments have a fixed redemption price - e.g. singapore savings bond can always be redeemed at par
Brokerage account that the trade was booked in
h for hypothetical | y for real trade
brokerage & exchange costs + any additional costs
